name: EDD Admin Notices
author: MSolution

sections.description:
A Simple Plugin for Easy Digital Downloads.

Add Admin Notices with links to Purchase history and the Download page in the Admin Dashboard & on admin edit profile page for the returning customers.

When a returning customer logs in to wordpress, he automatically ends up on his edit profile page in the admin section, which is more or less a dead enddead end for the visitor..

EDD Admin Notices adds 2 links on the Dashboard and on the profile page to the Purchase history and the Download page of EDD.

View Authors other plugins: WP AdPunch..

Support

Just contact us here http://www.wpadpunch.com/contact.php for any comments or suggestions.
sections.installation:
Upload the WP AdPunch Plugin to your blog (in the ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory) (be sure to upload the “edd-admin-notices” directory or it will not work.

Activate it in the plugins menu in your wp-admin control panel
sections.faq: Drop us a mail and we’ll get back to you.

short_description: A Plugin for Easy Digital Downloads. Adds Admin Notice with links to Purchase history & Download page on Admin Dashboard & profile page.
